title: Silinde, Elf of Mirkwood (1U60)
text:

Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven

Card Type:	Ally • Home 3 • Elf

Game Text:	While you can spot your site 3, Silinde has the game text of that site.
Lore:	Among the representatives of the Elves of Northern Mirkwood was Silinde, friend of the House of Thranduil.
